definitions: the quality of being based on random choice or personal whim, rather than any reason or system

examples.text: disparate peoples were forced together by the arbitrariness of a colonial map-maker's pen

shortDefinitions: quality of being based on random choice or personal whim

definitions: a lack of restraint in the use of authority; autocracy

examples.text: the law protects the people against the arbitrariness of those in office

shortDefinitions: lack of restraint in use of authority
